means: 把…比作( liken的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I am likening to a grain of wheat which faces one of three futures.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的命运如同一颗麦粒,有着三种不同的道路.

list.abs: For the latest on Shevchenko , Mourinho likened the Ukrainian ' s situation to that of Drogba ., 关于的最新情况 , 穆里尼奥将乌克兰人与德罗巴的形势相比较.

Briatore said that while top teams employ champion drivers , Rubens Barrichello is teetering on the point of retirement , and Button can be likened to a kind of Italian roadside concrete bollard .布里亚托尔说，尽管顶级球队聘请冠军车手，巴里切罗是溃败的退休，和按钮可比喻为一种意大利路边具体波兰德。
Sundar likened the effect of Web site interactivity a volume knob that boosts positive or negative perceptions associated with the site and its content .孙大信比喻的影响，网站互动卷旋钮提高了正面或负面的看法，与相关的网站及其内容。
Whether you liken yourself a tree or a blade of grass., 无论你想你自己成为一棵大树还是一片绿草.

entry.def: If you liken one thing or person to another thing or person, you say that they are similar.

example.ex: The pain is often likened to being drilled through the side of the head.
example.tran: 这种疼痛常被比作钻头钻入头部的感觉。

auth_sentence.content: Some optimist's are likening Junior Jack to a new Basement Jaxx.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some optimist's are likening Junior Jack to a new Basement Jaxx.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some optimist's are likening Junior Jack to a new Basement Jaxx.

auth_sentence.content: 'S likening the harvesting of doctors and other experts for Western industry to snatching slaves.
auth_sentence.res_content: 'S likening the harvesting of doctors and other experts for Western industry to snatching slaves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'S likening the harvesting of doctors and other experts for Western industry to snatching slaves.

auth_sentence.content: On Wednesday, Bashir vowed to crush South Sudan's government, likening the south's ruling SPLM party to an insect.
auth_sentence.res_content: On Wednesday, Bashir vowed to crush South Sudan's government, likening the south's ruling SPLM party to an insect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On Wednesday, Bashir vowed to crush South Sudan's government, likening the south's ruling SPLM party to an insect.
